title: NATO to update regional boundaries to strengthen Euro-Atlantic defenses
description: NATO's Allied Command Operations (ACO) will update its provisional, regional boundaries to enhance the Alliance’s military posture across the Euro-Atlantic area, Supreme Headquarters Allied Powers Europe (SHAPE) announced Thursday.
